isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - SKIRT PANELS, AERO SIDE SKIRT PANELS, BODY AIR DEFLECTORS, BUMPERS AND ROOFS - 0. AERODYNAMIC BUMPERS - AERODYNAMIC BUMPER AIR DAMS

svcsubproc.title: Remove

note.para: An assistant is required in the removal of the one piece bumper air dam.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 41 for the following Items in parentheses.

step1.para:
Beginning at the outside corner of the bumper air dam (left or right ), loosen (Item 5) 3/8"-16 UNC x 1 1/2" SST hex hd bolt, 3/8" flat washer, 3/8" lock washer and 3/8"-16 UNC grade 8 hex nut. Note: This item is a shared bolt assembly with the front bumper brace and tire shield, each side.
Follow procedure in step on opposite side of vehicle air dam.
Loosen and remove (Item 4) 3/8"- 16 UNC x 1-1/4" SST hex hd bolt, 3/8" SST washer, and 3/8"-16 UNC cad hex lock nut.

Removal of air dam front brace (See Detail Item 8), each side if necessary. Loosen and remove outside 3/8"-16 UNC grade 8 hex nut, and 3/8" lock washer. Remove brace. Remaining 3/8"-16 UNC hex hd bolt, 3/8" lock washer and 3/8"-16 UNC hex hd bolt may be removed if necessary. Follow procedure in Step 3 to remove opposite side air dam front brace.

With an assistant supporting the center of the air dam panel, loosen and remove the (Item 6) (7) 1/4"-20 UNC x 7/8" SST hex hd bolts, special flat washers, 1/4" SST plain lock washers and 1/4"-20 UNC SST hex nuts.
Loosen and remove (Item 5) 3/8" bolts, washers and hex nuts as outlined in Step 1. Remove the air dam panel.

svcsubproc.title: Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 41 for the following Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install air dam front bumper brace, if applicable. Insert 3/8"-16 UNC x 1-3/4" hex hd bolt (Item 1) through frame rail. Install 3/8" lock washer and 3/8"-16 UNC hex nut and torque to 19-27 ft-lbs (25 - 37 Nm). Install air dam bumper brace (Item 2). Install 3/8" lock washer and 3/8-16 UNC grade 8 hex nut (Item 1). Follow Step 1 procedure for installation of opposite side air dam bumper brace.

With the help of an assistant, place air dam panel against the bottom flange of the bumper and align with the 1/4" mounting holes. Insert 1/4"-20 UNC x 7/8" SST hex hd bolts, special flat washers, 1/4" SST plain lock washers and 1/4"-20 UNC SST hex nut. Hand tighten.

figure.caption: Figure 41. Aerodynamic Bumper Assembly (9400 i Series)

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. 3/8"-16 UNC x 1-3/4" HEX HD BOLT, 3/8" LOCK WASHER AND 3/8"- 16 UNC GRADE 8 HEX NUT
4. 3/8"-16 UNC x 1-1/4" SST HEX HD BOLT, 3/8" FLAT WASHER, 3/8" LOCK WASHER AND 3/8"-16 UNC GRADE 8 HEX NUT
5. 3/8"-16 x 1-1/2" SST HEX HD BOLT, 3/8" SST FLAT WASHER, 3/8" LOCK WASHER AND 3/8"-16 UNC GRADE 8 HEX NUT
6. 1/4"-20 UNC x 7/8" SST HEX HD BOLT, SPECIAL FLAT WASHER, 1/4" SST PLAIN LOCK WASHER AND 1/4"-20 UNC SST HEX NUT

step1.para: Align mounting brace (Item 2) lower 3/8" mounting holes with 3/8" mounting holes in air dam panel. Insert (Item 4) 3/8"- UNC x 1-1/4" SST hex hd bolt, 3/8" SST washer and 3/8"- 16 UNC cad hex hd lock nut. Bolt assembly should be installed head down. See detail ( Item 1). Hand tighten. Follow Step 3 procedure for opposite side brace and panel.

Insert (Item 52) 3/8"-16 UNC x 1-1/2" SST hex head bolt, 3/8" flat washer, 3/8" lock washer and 3/8"-16 UNC Grade 8 hex nut through air dam panel, head down. Align with bumper lower flange and bumper brace. Bumper brace must be mounted inside bumper flange (each side)
Inspect air dam panel and associated brackets for correct fit.
